relationships.description: Professor McGonagall will lead Harry to his doom.
Hermione Granger is whispering fast about spells she's learned while the twenty ghosts are arguing and hardly glancing at her.
The fat little monk ghost is saying 'Forgive and forget' to the other ghosts.
Harry Potter has to take a school report home to his relatives, the Dursleys.
